author: Robert Govan
comment: Great app overall, would love to see support for cricket in the future.

reply.author: DevLoa
reply.content:
Thank you very much for your feedback, I appreciate it! 
The feature you are suggesting is on my to-do list, I hope to figure out a nice solution in the near future.

(Edit 19-11-2014) I have just updated the app with this feature, should be available pretty soon. Hope you like it.

title: Very handy
